title: Hollyoaks spoilers: Darren cheats on Mandy with Nancy
text:
(Picture: Lime Pictures)

Devastation ensued during Hollyoaks last night, as several of the soap’s characters were left for dead following the crane collapse — which was brought on by Breda McQueen (Moya Brady) having crashed her car. With Charlie and Ella trapped in the tunnels below, Nancy and Darren Osbourne (Jessica Fox and Ashely Taylor Dawson) headed off to locate the children — but they found themselves trapped as a result. Tonight, the pair search for a way out, but will old feelings resurface in the process?

As chaos reigned in the village, Walter (Trevor A Toussaint) made it his mission to inform Nancy and Darren that he saw Charlie and Ella heading down to the tunnels below prior to the incident with the crane. Horrified, the pair headed off in search of the kids.

However — unbeknown to Nancy and Darren — Charlie and Ella had already managed to find a way out of the tunnels, and thus they continued searching — and matters were made worse when the roof above them began to cave in.

(Picture: Lime Pictures)

Tonight, Leela (Kirsty-Leigh Porter) enquires if there’s anyone else down in tunnels, and Charlie claims that there isn’t — as he hasn’t a clue about Nancy and Darren having gone down there.

Meanwhile, Nancy and Darren come to the realisation that no-one knows where they are— which means that nobody will come looking for them.

While waiting for the dust to settle, the pair have a chat — but that chat soon gets a bit heated, and thus they bicker about their past.

(Picture: Lime Pictures)

They begin to wonder if they’re going to survive, and — with emotions running high — it seems as if old feelings will come the forefront.

Will Nancy and Darren fully cheat on their respective partners?

Tensions have been high between Darren and Mandy (Sarah Jayne Dunn) as a result of Darren learning that he’s not DJ’s dad.

What’s more, Kyle (Adam Rickitt) wasn’t too pleased at Nancy for getting involved in her ex’s business earlier in the week, so it’s fair to say that both couples have gone through a bit of a rough patch as of late.

Nancy and Darren have a long history together, and — with their lives on the line — perhaps they will give into temptation?

Hollyoaks continues Wednesday 30th October at 7pm on E4.

description: With Darren and Nancy trapped in the tunnels — and no-one coming to their rescue — old feelings seemingly come to the forefront.
